name: Demon's GunPlay
description:
↓↓↓↓↓Click picture to check campaign↓↓↓↓↓





Absolutely no communication with these guys.
We have to leave here as quickly as possible. There's no other way besides fighting.
The purpose of those guys is just to hunt.

When I came back to my senses, I saw an unfamiliar environment...
This is the world of Succubus,

"Succubus" is a demon that takes away the essence of humans after having sex with them.

As long as you have contact with Succubus and are restrained,
You will be attacked by semen extraction.

There is no way to deal with it but to break through head-on! ?
Defeat the Succubus and find a way to escape from here! !


  • Hardcore Action RPG

    Hardcore action RPG
    Use real-time combat,
    After equipping the weapon and taking a stance, you can attack!!
    Whether it's a knife or a pistol, as long as it can defeat Succubus, it's a good weapon!!
    But if you’re not careful, you’ll be drained by the Succubus <3


  • Collect materials to craft various items

    Materials collected on the map can be used for crafting at the safe house.
    Whether it's ammunition or supplies, as long as you have enough materials, you can craft them,
    Make sure to be fully prepared before battle!
    Otherwise... you will see various animations of being squeezed out of semen.

  • Exquisite pixel animation

    If you get caught by Succubus, pixel art animations will immediately play,
    Even the pixels can be stunning!!
    There are also rich lines in various situations to enhance the pleasure of being raped.


  • Notes of the victims

    Collect the notes of the victims to learn about the Succubus' habits.
    As the saying goes, "Know yourself and your enemy and you will be victorious."
    If you want to defeat the Succubus, You must first know what they are capable of!!



To successfully clear the game, it's essential to manage your inventory wisely as every item is incredibly valuable. A single careless move could leave you without any items during crucial battles.

Various items are hidden in the dark corners of the map. By keeping your eyes wide open, you can gather plenty of supplies!

When surrounded by monsters, you don’t necessarily have to fight to the end;
Escape is the best strategy, tactical retreat is also an important skill.

In order to survive, explore every possible method to stay alive! Escape from this Succubus world!!
